author: hwright
msg: It's been debated for a while, and I'm finally going to do it:
Remove the contents of the www/ directory in our shipped tarballs, and
just include the current trunk version of hacking.html.
Remove www/* and export trunk's www/hacking.html into it before shipping.

author: cmpilato
msg: Recommend r29671 and r29672 for backport.

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #3108 by raising an error for 'svn cl FOO' or svn cl
NOTE:  I'm not sure I fully agree with this course of action, but I
don't disagree enough stand in the way of correcting the general UI
problem of running a command only to see nothing happening.
(svn_cl__changelist): Don't add the implicit dot target; instead,
error if no paths are provided.
